songs.title: Some Kind of Miracle
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Prayed for an angel
To come in the night
Shine some sweet light on me
Found only strangers
Then you came to me
Just when I've given up
You gave me love (You gave me love)
My world was tumbling down
You turned it around, baby

[Chorus]
Ooh
You're some kind of miracle
Ohh, you, you, you are
You're a miracle to me

[Verse 2]
Sweet revelation
That look in your eyes
Your touch in the night
I found the sweetest salvation
In your arms, baby
Whoa, there's no morning sun
Your tender love (Your tender love)
Came and just lifted me up
Look what you've done, baby

[Chorus]
Ooh
You're some kind of miracle
Ohh, you, you, you are
You're a miracle to me
Ohh

[Verse 3]
You brought joy to my heart
I found love in your arms
See what you've done to me
You set my soul so free
You came and you gave me the love that I need

[Chorus]
Oh you, you're some kind of miracle
Baby, yeah
You're a miracle
A miracle to me
Baby, you are
Oh, a miracle to me
